snippet.title: The Great Circle | Kickstarter Launch
snippet.description:
The Great Circle is an African survival experience set in a Tanzanian wildlife reserve! Experience the daily struggles of hundreds of wild animals in this realistic depiction of nature, and the complicated role that humans play in the environment.

PLAY EARLY ACCESS via Patreon Subscription
Consider becoming a Patreon to help support TGC's continued development and expansion. Thank you for your encouragement! https://www.patreon.com/thegreatcircle

DONATE via Paypal
https://www.paypal.com/donate?token=G1HvOT5_roGmppc-WH-KvH6VC-WVOMlHCBqGsqf1syfLltoVb2OHjYMtcpM1qb5JlAWuSTSSwLG8kbGm

FOLLOW US  (Youtube, Twitch, Instagram, Discord, Steam...more)
https://linktr.ee/thegreatcircle

DEV TEAM
TJ- Project Director, Organizer

VOLUNTEERS & CONTRIBUTORS
If anyone would like to help build this game, please reach out to the devs via our discord. *Currently the game is being built via volunteer effort alone, when that changes we will update everyone, thanks!

CONTACT
*Message TJ on discord (https://linktr.ee/thegreatcircle)

DONATIONS & SUPPORT
You can support TGC's development by sharing with friends or anyone! Or you can join donate via Paypal at the link below! Please only donate what you can afford, and remember that for TGC even a small amount goes a long way towards more animals, animations,  mechanics, more developers! Thank you for your support! https://www.paypal.com/donate?token=G1HvOT5_roGmppc-WH-KvH6VC-WVOMlHCBqGsqf1syfLltoVb2OHjYMtcpM1qb5JlAWuSTSSwLG8kbGm


#thegreatcircle​​ #animalsurvivalgame​​ #africananimalgame​​ #thegreatcirclegame​​ #playanimals​​ #upcominggame​
